name: Planetary Platformer
description:
Planetary Platformer was modded by Sarah Wood

the modifications include:

3 Unique levels

New original in game music (I am not a composer, but I really did try)

A new and original out of bounds damaging system, this causes the player to take damage after falling for a certain distance and/or amount of time (it may not seem like a lot but this one I am extremely proud of as it took ages to figure out!) (I could not find an easy way to do it lol)
